dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3348139J] Copyright Images
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Sent: Monday, March 05, 2007 6:50 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C3348139J] Copyright Images ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Copyright Images Added by system at Tuesday, Mar 6 2007 12:49 am X-MailFrom: sunil@indiaenews.com X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Tue Mar 6 00:48:49 2007 Received: (qmail 16473 invoked by alias); 6 Mar 2007 06:48:49 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 16470 invoked from network); 6 Mar 2007 06:48:49 -0000 Received: from unknown (HELO DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL) (172.16.220.10) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 6 Mar 2007 06:48:49 -0000 Received: from Exchanger.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.101]) by DALD2EXCH01.PLANET.LOCAL with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 6 Mar 2007 00:48:49 -0600 Received: from mailin.ev1servers.net ([207.218.222.124]) by Exchanger.ev1servers.net with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Tue, 6 Mar 2007 00:48:43 -0600 X-ASG-Debug-ID: 1173163717-13836-2-0 X-Barracuda-URL: http://207.218.222.124:8000/cgi-bin/mark.cgi X-ASG-Recipient-Whitelist: abuse@ev1servers.net Received: from pala.lunarpages.com (pala.lunarpages.com [216.227.219.48]) by mailin.ev1servers.net (Spam Firewall) with ESMTP id ACBBA6FDC3 for ; Tue, 6 Mar 2007 00:48:42 -0600 (CST) Received: from [122.163.122.244] (helo=db) by pala.lunarpages.com with esmtpa (Exim 4.63) (envelope-from ) id 1HOTTC-0003CM-JO; Mon, 05 Mar 2007 22:48:25 -0800 From: "Sunil - India eNews" To: Cc: X-ASG-Orig-Subj: Copyright Images Subject: Copyright Images Date: Tue, 6 Mar 2007 12:18:17 +0530 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Type: multipart/related; boundary="----=_NextPart_000_00D4_01C75FE9.899BDB60" X-Priority: 1 (Highest) X-MSMail-Priority: High X-Mailer: Microsoft Office Outlook, Build 11.0.5510 X-MimeOLE: Produced By Microsoft MimeOLE V6.00.2900.3028 Thread-Index: Acdfu2uppxL8TjkiTfSvcse75g4efA== Importance: High X-AntiAbuse: This header was added to track abuse, please include it with any abuse report X-AntiAbuse: Primary Hostname - pala.lunarpages.com X-AntiAbuse: Original Domain - ev1servers.net X-AntiAbuse: Originator/Caller UID/GID - [47 12] / [47 12] X-AntiAbuse: Sender Address Domain - indiaenews.com X-Source: X-Source-Args: X-Source-Dir: Message-Id: <20070306064842.ACBBA6FDC3@mailin.ev1servers.net> X-Virus-Scanned: by Barracuda Spam Firewall at ev1servers.net X-Barracuda-Spam-Score: 0.00 X-Barracuda-Spam-Status: No, SCORE=0.00 using global scores of TAG_LEVEL=4.0 QUARANTINE_LEVEL=1000.0 KILL_LEVEL=8.0 WHITELISTED Return-Path: sunil@indiaenews.com X-OriginalArrivalTime: 06 Mar 2007 06:48:43.0426 (UTC) FILETIME=[7B39D820:01C75FBB] (multipart/related) Multipart prefix (text/plain) This is a multi-part message in MIME format. (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) http://www.indianidol3.info/hosts.html More Info about domain owner: http://whois.domaintools.com/indianidol3.info You are using copyright images created my India eNews staff without permission. Please take them down immediately. http://www.indianidol3.info/indian-idol-3.jpg http://www.indianidol3.info/indian-idol-3-judge.jpg These images was created by India eNews staff and first published on internet on 12th and 15the Feb respectively, in below articles. http://www.indiaenews.com/bollywood/20070212/39106.htm http://www.indiaenews.com/bollywood/20070215/39588.htm Even the article was first published on IndiaeNews.com and you copied it as it is.
